name: Out of the World
description:
【 In this world, "only what you see" is true. 】

This game is a 2.5D platformer puzzle action game in which objects seen by the character materialize, and when you meditate and open your eyes again, the object you saw disappears.

Enjoy the thrill of advancing based on your memory, and the pleasure you get when that memory is correct.


◆How to operate the game.
In addition to the basic movement and jump controls, the viewpoint control and eye close/open controls allow the user to enjoy a new puzzle experience unlike any other.
The game also incorporates a number of action elements that even those who are not good at action puzzles can enjoy.

◆Stages
There are a total of 50 stages, so you can experience the fun of this game to your heart's content.

◆Story
The main character has been deceived by the Internet society and wandered into a mysterious world.
Please enjoy the story of the main character as he asks himself questions in this mysterious world and "derives his own answers".
Is the world really only what you see...?

◆The challenge element
After completing all the stages, think of ways to clear the game and play while collecting "hearts" in each stage.

◆Distribution guidelines

Game distribution: OK for both individuals and corporations
Spoiling: OK
Monetization: OK

▼ Please be sure to include the following
Twitter URL
Steam URL
